mapper.select: SELECT a.phone, a.user_img, b.wx_openid FROM `vsettle_myz_merge`.`t_sys_user_info` a JOIN `vsettle_myz_merge`.`t_sys_auth_info` b ON a.id = b.user_id WHERE LEFT(a.user_img, 4) = "http" AND phone <> ""
mapper.sql: id, user_id, wx_openid, wx_unionid, wx_refresh_token, wb_uid, wb_access_token, auth_type, status_id, trading_id, create_time, update_time, company_id, plat_form_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_sys_auth_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_auth_info (id, user_id, wx_openid, wx_unionid, wx_refresh_token, wb_uid, wb_access_token, auth_type, status_id, trading_id, create_time, update_time, company_id, plat_form_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wxOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxUnionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxRefreshToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wbUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wbAccessToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{statusId,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{tradingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{platFormId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
